title: Protobuf error when build catkin workspace

content.raw:
Hi all,

I’m trying to follow this tutorial on building catkin work space [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall). The problem is that I have some errors related to protoc version \(or protocol buffer, I guess so\).  This is the image of one of the many packages that have the problem:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1024181238-image.png)
My protoc version:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2695470097-image.png)
If there is any solution for this please let me know. Thanks in advance.

PS: I still can use Docker Image to start the simulation but it’s really hard to code and run it on Docker image because I have to code without suggestion and clone code to Docker container if I want to run it.

Hi all,

I’m trying to follow this tutorial on building catkin work space #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall. The problem is that I have some errors related to protoc version (or protocol buffer, I guess so). This is the image of one of the many packages that have the problem:

My protoc version:

If there is any solution for this please let me know. Thanks in advance.

PS: I still can use Docker Image to start the simulation but it’s really hard to code and run it on Docker image because I have to code without suggestion and clone code to Docker container if I want to run it.
